name: Mixed Metal Papillon Necklace - Sterling Silver and Copper
description: This copper Papillon is sawed by hand from pure copper sheet and then soldered to a 1 1/8" disc of sterling silver. The disc is stamped with a little butterfly, hammered on the edges, then finished with a tube rivet, and extra heavy jump ring. The pendant hangs on a 20" 1.8mm ball chain that closes with a lobster clasp. The necklace will arrive in a gifty box. U.S. shipping INCLUDES INSURANCE. I'm working on other breeds too. Email me me if you're interested in a different breed.

name: the little dog laughed - Hand Stamped Agility Necklace - Sterling Silver
description:
The a-frame and tunnel. Two of my little dogs' favorites.

This 1 1/8" sterling silver disc is sawed from 20 gauge silver and hand-stamped with "the little dog laughed to see such sport" or the message of your choice. It is then domed to add dimension. A 6mm Swarovski crystal adds some sparkle. The pendant hangs on an 18" rolo chain that closes with a trigger clasp. Other types and lengths of chain are available. Just drop me a line and let me know what you want. Other colors of crystal also available.

Note: This necklace is made to order. I am not a machine. :) Each letter is stamped by hand and each has its own slight variation. This is part of what makes your piece special and unlike any other.

U.S. shipping INCLUDES INSURANCE.

name: agility is a journey - Hand Stamped Sterling Silver Spiral Pendant Necklace
description: Dog agility is a journey. Sometimes you end up in an entirely different direction from where you began. But it's in the journey where we find our greatest rewards. Ribbons fade but the journey lives within us. This sterling silver spiral pendant is big and thick--1 1/8" in diameter and 16 gauge silver (1.3 mm thick)--and has a soldered bail. And yet its weight is comforting. That's why I like to wear mine on a 22" ball chain where it lies close to the heart. It's a good length to wear over a t-shirt and even long enough for a turtleneck or polo. All components are sterling silver. Available with or without a Swarovski crystal attached. The one shown is crystal vitrail, but I have just about any color you might want. Email me with your choice of crystal. Available with other text. Email me if you need to know if what you want will fit. U.S. shipping INCLUDES INSURANCE.

name: Rustic Dog Tag Necklace with Heart - Oxidized Sterling Silver
description:
A long stylized heart is soldered to a 5/8" by 1" dog tag. The tag is finished with a tube rivet, extra heavy jump ring and then hung on a 20" 1.8mm ball chain. Then it's all oxidized for an aged patina. The heart and tag are sawed by hand from 22g sterling silver sheet.

Perfect gift for someone you'd like to carry your heart.

The necklace will arrive in a gifty box.

U.S. shipping INCLUDES INSURANCE.

name: Canis Major - Hand Stamped Necklace - Sterling Silver
description:
A 7/8 inch disc is cut from sterling silver sheet, lightly hammered on the edge, and hand stamped with the constellation Canis Major. It is shown on an 18" cable chain that closes with a trigger clasp. 

All components are sterling silver and the necklace will be packed in a gifty jewelry box.

U.S. shipping INCLUDES INSURANCE.

In Greek myth Canis Major, aka the Great Dog, and Canis Minor (the not-so-great dog?) were Orion's hunting dogs. Canis Major was one of the most important constellations in ancient times because the brightest star in the sky is part of it.

Sirius, the Dog Star, is the brightest star in the night sky. Only the Moon and the planets Venus, Jupiter and Mars are brighter.

Canis Major is easy to find November through March. Just locate Orion the Hunter, which dominates the winter sky, and imagine a straight line through his belt. Follow the line to the southeast, and you will see Sirius perched right below it.
